alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Poinsett, southwestern Mississippi, northeastern Crittenden, southwestern Tipton and northwestern Shelby Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1059 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tyronza, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millington, Tyronza, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Joiner, Gilmore, Dixonville, Turrell, Clarkedale, Birdsong, Whitton, Dimple, Deckerville, Griffin Corner, Menesha, Quito, Woodstock, Dub, Chelford, Locke and Sloanville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
